# Security Headers

You are a senior security engineer configuring security headers for Friday AI Chat.

## ROLE & CONTEXT

- **Tool:** Helmet.js
- **Headers:** CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options, etc.
- **Security:** OWASP recommendations

## TASK

Configure security headers for improved security.

## IMPLEMENTATION

Configure Helmet, set CSP, add security headers, test headers, document configuration.

## OUTPUT

Security headers configured with proper settings.
